title: 5 ‘smart degree’ paths that lead straight to AI jobs
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) continues to reshape industries and societies worldwide, creating robust demand for professionals with expertise in AI technologies and applications. For those aspiring to enter the AI workforce, selecting a degree path that aligns well with this rapidly evolving field is crucial for success. In 2025, five key degree paths stand out as smart choices for launching a career in artificial intelligence, combining both academic rigour and industry relevance.

title: Is that a newscast or a sales pitch? New AI videos make it tough to tell
description: Artificial intelligence is now part of advertisers' arsenal, and some are using it to blur the line between newscast and sales pitch.
content:
In a short-form video post, an influencer gets worked up about a television news story from California. The images broadcast behind her appear authentic, with an anchor calling viewers to action, victims and even a CNN logo.
“California accident vict... [8212 chars]

title: The AI Spending Boom Is Massive But Not Unprecedented
description: The boom in capital expenditures related to generative artificial intelligence is generating lots of questions about whether it is sustainable. Coming up with definitive answers to them is something of a fool’s errand. Quantifying the size of the capex surge seems like a more productive endeavor — and one that may offer some hints as to its sustainability.
content: (Bloomberg Opinion) -- The boom in capital expenditures related to generative artificial intelligence is generating lots of questions about whether it is sustainable. Coming up with definitive answers to them is something of a fool’s errand. Quantify... [7684 chars]

title: European small businesses rush into AI without basic digital tools, study shows
description: (Reuters) -Most European small and mid-sized enterprises are prioritizing artificial intelligence systems over basic digital tools across their businesses, losing ground to bigger firms investing in core digital systems, a study published on Wednesday showed.

description: Kevin O'Leary says artificial intelligence is now the smartest and most affordable investment for small businesses.

title: Robin Williams' daughter calls AI videos of late dad 'gross' and begs them to stop

title: Commission outlines support plan to get industries adopting AI
description: Today's officially unveiled Apply AI strategy urges whole branches of industries to lean into using artificial intelligence, but finer execution detail is lacking
content:
Tech Commissioner Henna Virkkunen presented the Commission’s Apply AI strategy on Wednesday, outlining a support plan aimed at helping industries across Europe adopt artificial intelligence at scale.
